scripts.postinstall: npm run all "npm --prefix backend install" "npm --prefix frontend-govt install" "npm --prefix shared install" && node -e "if (process.env.NODE_ENV === undefined){process.exit(1)}" || npm run --prefix shared build
scripts.dev: npm run --prefix shared build && npm run all -- --kill-others "npm:on-* dev"
scripts.dev:full: npm run all "npm run docker-dev" "npm run dev"
scripts.lint: npm run all "npm:on-* lint" "npm run --prefix shared lint"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run all "npm:on-* lint:fix" "npm run --prefix shared lint:fix"
scripts.build: npm run --prefix shared build && npm run all "npm:on-* build"
scripts.test: npm run all "npm:on-* test" "npm run --prefix shared test"
